highlights.title: Introduction to Ototoxicity
highlights.description: Overview of drugs causing ototoxicity is crucial for medical students.

highlights.title: Vancomycin and Ototoxicity
highlights.description: Understanding vancomycin's effects helps in clinical decisions.

highlights.title: Aminoglycosides Explained
highlights.description: Key association with ototoxicity and nephrotoxicity highlighted.

highlights.title: Platinum Compounds
highlights.description: Cisplatin and carboplatin's ototoxic effects are critical for oncology.

highlights.title: Loop Diuretics Overview
highlights.description: Loop diuretics' side effects including ototoxicity are essential knowledge.

highlights.title: Ethacrynic Acid's Risks
highlights.description: Ethacrynic acid's higher ototoxicity is important for patient safety.

highlights.title: Memorable Mnemonics
highlights.description: Using 'odang' helps remember multiple adverse effects.

highlights.title: Conclusion and Summary
highlights.description: Recap of key drugs and their associations with ototoxicity.

highlights.title: Call to Action
highlights.description: Encouragement to like and subscribe fosters community engagement.
